title: Mechanical Draftsman
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Mechanical Draftsman to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Technical Drawings: Create detailed and accurate technical drawings, schematics, and blueprints that depict mechanical components, systems, and structures
  • AutoCAD and CAD Software: Utilize computer-aided design (CAD) software, such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks, or similar tools, to generate and edit drawings
  • Design Collaboration: Collaborate with engineers, designers, and other professionals to translate their concepts and designs into technical drawings
  • Dimensioning and Scaling: Ensure that drawings include appropriate dimensions, scaling, and notations, allowing manufacturers and builders to understand the specifications
  • Material Specifications: Include information on materials, tolerances, and manufacturing methods in the drawings
  • Revision and Updates: Revise and update drawings as needed, incorporating changes and improvements to designs
  • Documentation: Maintain accurate records of drawings, revisions, and design history

title: HVAC Engineers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for HVAC Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • We are seeking a skilled and experienced HVAC Engineer to join our team
  • The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, installing, and maintaining heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems to ensure efficient and comfortable environments within buildings
Responsibilities:
  • System Design:Design HVAC systems, considering factors such as load calculations, equipment selection, and energy efficiency
  • Collaborate with architects and other engineering disciplines to integrate HVAC systems into building designs
  • Installation Oversight:Supervise the installation of HVAC systems, ensuring compliance with design specifications, local codes, and safety standards
  • Conduct site visits to assess installation progress and address any issues that may arise
  • Equipment Selection:Specify and select HVAC equipment, including air handling units, chillers, boilers, and other components, based on project requirements and efficiency considerations
  • Evaluate and recommend new technologies to enhance system performance
  • System Testing and Commissioning:Conduct testing and commissioning of HVAC systems to verify functionality and performance
  • Collaborate with contractors and commissioning agents to resolve issues and ensure proper operation
  • Maintenance and Troubleshooting:Provide ongoing support for HVAC systems, including troubleshooting issues and implementing solutions
  • Develop preventive maintenance schedules and procedures to optimize system performance
  • Energy Efficiency Optimization:Identify opportunities for improving energy efficiency in HVAC systems
  • Recommend and implement measures to reduce energy consumption and operational costs
  • Code Compliance:Ensure compliance with local, state, and national building codes and regulations
  • Stay informed about industry trends, standards, and best practices
  • Documentation:Prepare detailed engineering documentation, including system drawings, specifications, and reports
  • Maintain accurate records of system installations, modifications, and maintenance activities

title: Electrical Design Engineers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Electrical Design Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Research and draft blueprints, engineering plans, and graphics.
  2. Develop test prototypes.
  3. Identify solutions to improve production efficiency.
  4. Use design software to develop models and drawings of new products.
  5. Maintain existing engineering records and designs.
  6. Assess all engineering prototypes to determine issues or risks.
  7. Estimate cost limits and budgets for new designs.
  8. Supervise the manufacturing process of all designs.
  9. Coordinate with other engineers, management, and the creative department.

title: Site Engineers
jobDescription: They monitor and control work progress,resolve any issues or conflicts that arise,and ensure efficient utilization of resources . Quality Control: The Site Engineer ensures that construction work meets the required quality standards .

title: Inspection Engineers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Inspection Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • An Inspection Engineer is responsible for ensuring the quality, safety, and compliance of products, processes, or systems within their industry
  • They inspect, test, and evaluate equipment, materials, and procedures to identify and rectify defects, deviations, or non-compliance issues
Key Responsibilities:
  • Inspection and Testing:Conduct inspections and tests on equipment, components, or products to ensure they meet quality and safety standards
  • Use various tools, instruments, and techniques to perform inspections, such as visual inspection, non-destructive testing (NDT), and measurements
  • Documentation and Reporting:Maintain detailed records of inspection results, including photographs and measurements
  • Prepare inspection reports and documentation to report findings and recommendations for corrective actions
  • Compliance and Regulation:Ensure that all inspections adhere to industry standards, codes, and regulatory requirements
  • Stay updated on changes in relevant regulations and standards to maintain compliance
  • Quality Control:Collaborate with quality control teams to identify and address quality issues and non-conformities in products or processes
  • Provide input for process improvement and corrective actions
  • Safety Assurance:Monitor safety protocols and procedures to ensure they are being followed, identifying potential hazards, and suggesting improvements

title: Instrumentation Engineers
jobDescription:
Requirements:Education: Bachelors degree in Electrical,Electronics,or Instrumentation Engineering . A Masters degree may be preferred .

Experience: Previous experience in instrumentation engineering or a related field is required .

title: Refractory Engineers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Refractory Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Analyzing customer needs to determine appropriate solutions for complex technical issues
  2. Creating technical diagrams, flowcharts, formulas, and other written documentation to support projects
  3. Providing guidance to junior engineers on projects within their areas of expertise
  4. Conducting research on new technologies and products in order to recommend improvements to current processes
  5. Developing designs for new products or systems based on customer specifications
  6. Researching existing technologies to determine how they could be applied in new ways to solve problems
  7. Reviewing existing products or concepts to ensure compliance with industry standards, regulations, and company policies
  8. Preparing proposals for new projects, identifying potential problems, and proposing solutions
  9. Estimating costs and scheduling requirements for projects and evaluating results

title: Mechanical Engineers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Mechanical Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Designing, manufacturing, and installing components that fulfill requirements.
  2. Analyzing problems or deficiencies and developing solutions to resolve them.
  3. Conducting experiments and evaluations to improve and innovate product designs.
  4. Creating plans and designs using CAD technology.
  5. Estimating budgets and time scopes for each project.
  6. Writing technical documentation for machine operators.
  7. Ensuring that products meet compliance regulations.
  8. Collaborating with project managers and other engineers in our team.

title: Project Managers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Project Managers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Coordinating with cross-discipline team members to make sure that all parties are on track with project requirements, deadlines, and schedules.
  2. Meeting with project team members to identify and resolve issues.
  3. Submitting project deliverables and ensuring that they adhere to quality standards.
  4. Preparing status reports by gathering, analyzing, and summarizing relevant information.
  5. Establishing effective project communication plans and ensuring their execution.
  6. Facilitating change requests to ensure that all parties are informed of the impacts on schedule and budget.
  7. Coordinating the development of user manuals, training materials, and other documents as needed to enable successful implementation and turnover of the process or system to the clients.
  8. Identifying and developing new opportunities with clients.
  9. Obtaining customer acceptance of project deliverables.
  10. Managing customer satisfaction within the project transition period.
  11. Conducting post-project evaluation and identifying successful and unsuccessful project elements.

title: QA / QC Engineers
tagsAndSkills: qaqc,QC,Quality assurance engineering,Quality assurance,Quality assurance,QC engineering
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for QA / QC Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • A QA/QC Engineer is responsible for ensuring that products, projects, and processes meet established quality standards and specifications
  • This role involves monitoring and evaluating the production or construction processes to identify and address issues that could affect product quality
  • Additionally, the QA/QC Engineer plays a crucial role in creating and implementing quality control procedures and documentation
Key Responsibilities:
  • Quality Assurance:Develop and implement quality assurance policies, procedures, and standards
  • Ensure that products or projects meet or exceed customer and regulatory requirements
  • Conduct audits and inspections to identify areas for improvement in quality processes
  • Quality Control:Establish and maintain quality control procedures to monitor and measure product or project performance
  • Inspect materials, components, and finished products to verify their compliance with quality standards
  • Implement testing protocols and document test results
  • Documentation:Maintain comprehensive records of quality control activities, including test results, inspection reports, and corrective actions taken
  • Prepare quality documentation and reports for internal and external stakeholders
  • Process Improvement:Collaborate with other departments to identify and resolve quality-related issues
  • Continuously assess and improve quality control processes to enhance overall efficiency and product quality
  • Training and Compliance:Train personnel on quality control procedures and standards
  • Ensure compliance with relevant industry standards, regulations, and certifications
  • Problem Solving:Investigate and address non-conformities, defects, and quality-related incidents
  • Identify the root causes of quality issues and recommend corrective and preventive actions
  • Risk Assessment:Evaluate potential risks and hazards that could impact quality and safety
  • Develop risk assessment strategies and mitigation plans
  • Data Analysis:Utilize statistical analysis and data-driven techniques to monitor and improve quality control processes

title: Automation Engineers
jobDescription:
Rcad Consulting Engineers Private Limited is looking for Automation Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Analyzing processes and systems to identify areas for automation
  • Designing and implementing automation solutions using programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++
  • Configuring and programming automated systems and robots
  • Testing and debugging automation systems to ensure they meet specifications and requirements
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including software engineers and hardware engineers
  • Documenting automated processes and systems
  • Developing and executing training programs for users
  • Maintaining and upgrading automation systems as needed
  • Troubleshooting and resolving issues with automation systems
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
